# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here's the `wrap_string` function in Julia:

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    line = ""
    wrapped_text = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            wrapped_text *= line * "\n"
            line = word
        else
            line *= length(line) > 0 ? " " * word : word
        end
    end
    
    wrapped_text *= line
    return wrapped_text
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
text = "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog"
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text)
println(wrapped_text)
```

This will output:

```
The quick
brown fox
jumps over
the lazy
dog
```
